400.name: Bad Request
400.message: The request cannot be fulfilled due to bad syntax.

401.name: Unauthorized
401.message: Authentication is required and has failed or has not yet been provided.

402.name: Payment Required
402.message: Payment is required and has failed or has not yet been provided.

403.name: Forbidden
403.message: The request was a valid request, but the server is refusing to respond to it.

404.name: Not Found
404.message: The requested resource could not be found but may be available again in the future.

405.name: Method Not Allowed
405.message: A request was made of a resource using a request method not supported by that resource.

406.name: Not Acceptable
406.message: The requested resource is only capable of generating content not acceptable.

408.name: Request Timeout
408.message: The server did not receive a complete request message in time.

409.name: Conflict
409.message: The request could not be processed because of conflict in the request.

410.name: Gone
410.message: The requested resource is no longer available and will not be available again.

411.name: Length Required
411.message: The request did not specify the length of its content, which is required by the resource.

412.name: Precondition Failed
412.message: The server does not meet one of the preconditions that the requester put on the request.

413.name: Payload Too Large
413.message: The server cannot process the request because the request payload is too large.

414.name: URI Too Long
414.message: The request-target is longer than the server is willing to interpret.

415.name: Unsupported Media Type
415.message: The request entity has a media type which the server or resource does not support.

417.name: Expectation Failed
417.message: The expectation given could not be met by at least one of the inbound servers.

422.name: Unprocessable Entity
422.message: The request was well-formed but was unable to be followed due to semantic errors.

426.name: Upgrade Required
426.message: The server cannot process the request using the current protocol.

428.name: Precondition Required
428.message: The origin server requires the request to be conditional.

429.name: Too Many Requests
429.message: The user has sent too many requests in a given amount of time.

500.name: Internal Server Error
500.message: An error has occurred and this resource cannot be displayed.

501.name: Not Implemented
501.message: The server either does not recognize the request method, or it lacks the ability to fulfil the request.

502.name: Bad Gateway
502.message: The server was acting as a gateway or proxy and received an invalid response from the upstream server.

503.name: Service Unavailable
503.message: The server is currently unavailable. It may be overloaded or down for maintenance.

504.name: Gateway Timeout
504.message: The server was acting as a gateway or proxy and did not receive a timely response from the upstream server.

505.name: HTTP Version Not Supported
505.message: The server does not support the HTTP protocol version used in the request.
